#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation
= Development Introduction =

pswrdgen and pswrdgeniron is now on a quarterly development schedule since most major features are now implemented.  If you are interested in participating in this project email joesox.

== Developer Standards ==
We ask that all developers use the following guidelines to ensure stable versions and not break any versions of pswrdgeniron.
<br>
pswrdgen.py development:<br>
1)Work with a copy of pswrdgen.py<br>
2)Thoroughly test your working copy.<br>
3)Repeat step 1 and 2 until no bugs.<br>
4)Commit changes.<br>
5)Update issue trackers.<br>
6)Make sure joesox posts new epydoc version.<br>
<br>
pswrdgeniron development:<br>
1)Work with a copy of the pswrdgeniron Visual Studio project.<br>
2)Make sure you are using the latest version of pswrdgen.py.<br>
2)Thoroughly test your working copy.<br>
3)Repeat step 1 and 2 until no bugs.<br>
4)Commit changes.<br>
5)Update issue trackers.<br>
6)If needed, make sure joesox posts new epydoc version.<br>
7)Make sure joesox updates pswrdgeniron's Codeproject website<br>
<br>
